title: Veggie falafel burgers
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '2 spring onions, chopped', '75g (3 oz) mushrooms, diced', '1 (400g) tin chickpeas, undrained', '3 cloves garlic, chopped', 'small handful chopped fresh coriander', 'small handful chopped fresh parsley', '1 1/2 tablespoons curry powder', '1/2 teaspoon ground cumin', '50g (2 oz) dried breadcrumbs', '2 egg whites', '2 tablespoons olive oil for frying, or as needed']
